name: smart-memory
description: Smart memory with hybrid search (BM25 + vectors) and Focus Agent for curated retrieval. SQLite backend, zero configuration, local embeddings.
author: Nyx

tools.name: memory_search
tools.description: Search memory files with automatic method selection. Uses vector embeddings (semantic search) if indexed, otherwise falls back to built-in keyword search. Supports Focus Mode for complex queries.

query.description: The search query - natural language, concepts, or keywords

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: memory_sync
tools.description: Sync memory files to vector index for better search quality. Run after editing memory files.

tools.name: memory_status
tools.description: Check memory system status - vector index ready, chunks indexed, last sync time, current mode.

tools.name: memory_mode
tools.description: Toggle between Fast mode (direct search) and Focus mode (curated retrieval with synthesis).

mode.description: Search mode: 'fast' for direct vector search, 'focus' for curated multi-pass retrieval
